author: cms-tau-pog
body:
Dear colleagues, 

this is a PR on small clean-ups in preparation for a backport to CMSSW_8_0_X on user request. Against my usual policy I'm merging uncorrelated pits and pieces, since these are really small and partially cosmetic changes: 
- increasing flexibility of my own light weight validation tools a bit
- adding a fix to restore indeed high-level running of PAT tools in scheduled mode
- clean-up of comment lines. 

Once I'm back from shopping the plan is to backport a few commits I've done some time ago (together with the small clean up parts of this PR) to 80X (also some time ago already announced in an AT/RECO meeting that I would do this...)

Cheers,
Roger
title: Small cleanups and modifications of light weight tau s/w validation tools
